items.title: Life with GSM/CDMA
items.author: Nakul Chandra
items.description:
If we think mobile phones (GSM/CDMA) & wireless internet (3G/4G/WiFi) have enriched our lives, and if we feel we cannot live without them even for a day, then we must all be grateful to Sir Jagadish Chandra Bose, who had invented wireless communication more than a century ago & had laid a strong foundation for the evolution of modern wireless technologies.
Way back in 1895 itself, Sir JC Bose had demonstrated his wireless communication experiments to public. Two years later, in 1897, Marconi used the same concepts to boost his career, and surprisingly, the world media as well as the International scientific community suddenly started working overtime to promote Marconi as the father of wireless communication, while ignoring, and even intentionally suppressing Sir JC Bose’s pioneering efforts in this field.

(Probably the American & European Scientists of the International Scientific Community could not digest the fact that an Indian could invent such revolutionary technology, despite Marconi himself repeatedly acknowledging Bose’s efforts in most of his research papers).

Unfortunately, due to the powerful coterie & immense grip the propagandists had over traditional media, Marconi was being hailed as the inventor of wireless for more than a century. I still remember those quiz-books I had during my childhood which clearly stated that Marconi was the father of wireless communication. In fact, most of the quiz-books didn’t even have Sir JC Bose as an option in their “Multiple Choice Questions”. Such is the large scale brainwashing that we Indians (as well as the world) have been going through, and in the process, forgetting our own Indian Scientists.

However, thanks to the advent of internet, penetration of social media and the revival of Indian Nationalism, there are now several profound voices which are questioning the veracity of the propagandic claim and are providing counter facts from highly reliable sources, including sources like US Patent Office which actually have documented evidences of JC Bose’s pioneering efforts, and thus India’s role in development & shaping of wireless communication, which has been the foundation for today’s host of technologies including Satellite communications, Microwave Communications, 3G & WiFi, which have become such an integral part of our lives that without them, our world will literally come to a standstill.

Life with GSM/CDMA was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

Life with GSM/CDMA was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

items.title: Top Free and Open Source Bulk SMS Software
items.author: Nakul Chandra
items.description:
Getting innovative in oneself and wooing new customers goes hand in hand, especially in our current competitive economy. With every other day’s challenges in business that are calling for more time and the ongoing changes in the business environment, one has to be more innovative in order to be in the business. And one way in which leaps in technology have impacted heavily is on the ways of reaching customers.

Right from sending firm’s representatives to emails and now SMS, marketing scene has taken much unprecedented route. The importance of sending SMS as opposed to email is about getting the immediate responses associated with text messages. And, due to such reasons, SMS services have become an integral part for many businesses. However, due to the tariffs charged by most SMS providers in the present scenario, most businesses may not benefit from the huge sales opportunity

Top Free and Open Source Bulk SMS Software was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

items.title: BulkSMS Text Messenger
items.author: Nakul Chandra
items.description:
The enables you to manage your SMS communications from your computer desktop. This free to install, user friendly desktop software allows you to easily compose, manage, send and receive individual and bulk SMS campaigns.

Just download on your system right now : http://msgque.com

BulkSMS Text Messenger was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

items.title: Benefits of Bulk SMS Marketing
items.author: Nakul Chandra
items.description:
Bulk SMS marketing basically involves conducting or promoting business using SMS or short messaging service, now more popularly known as the text message. To be more efficient with this, some brilliant minds developed what we now call bulk SMS messaging.

This enables a mobile phone, or text messaging software uploaded on a laptop or desktop computer, to send text messages to dozens, hundreds, even thousands of mobile phone users, depending on how the settings were programmed.

Benefits of Bulk SMS Marketing was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

items.title: playSMS is a free and open source SMS management software.
items.author: Nakul Chandra
items.description:
A flexible Web-based mobile portal system that it can be made to fit to various services such as an SMS gateway, bulk SMS provider, personal messaging system, corporate and group communication tools

Feature Highlights

  • Multiple database engine supported (through PHP PEAR DB, included in this package)
  • Send SMS to single mobile phone
  • Send SMS broadcasted to a group of mobile phones, or SMS bulk
  • Support sending text, flash and unicode messages
  • Capable of handling large amount of SMS (user reported 500k SMS monthly)
  • Receive private SMS to Inbox and forward it to email (mobile2web) and user’s mobile phone
  • Forward single SMS from mobile to a group of mobile phones
  • Provides SMS to email and email to SMS by polling mailbox
  • SMS autoreply, for easy autoreplying formatted incoming SMS
  • SMS board, forward received SMS to email, export output in JSON and a few other formats
  • SMS command, execute server side shell script using SMS
  • SMS custom, forward incoming SMS to custom apps, locally or hosted on external URL
  • SMS poll, manage polling system using SMS, export output in graph, JSON and other formats
  • SMS quiz, serve quizzes on SMS
  • SMS subscribe, manage user subscribes to a service using SMS
  • SMS sync to utilize SMSSync app from http://smssync.ushahidi.com
  • Blacklist, stoplist and firewall plugin for SMS services protections
  • Create your own features, tools, themes and gateway modules as a plugin
  • Supports software gateway such as Gammu, Jasmin, Kannel and SMS Server Tools 3
  • Supports bulk SMS providers such as Nexmo, Twilio, Infobip and Clickatell
  • Supports many other bulk SMS providers using Generic gateway plugin
  • Supports sending/receiving SMS via another playSMS using Planet or Uplink gateway plugin
  • Supports simulation gateway for testing incoming and outgoing SMS
  • Supports multiple active SMSC
  • Route outgoing SMS by prefix
  • Route outgoing SMS per user
  • Webservices for sending SMS, retrieving delivery reports, checking credits and more
  • Long SMS support, length of text is configurable
  • Rate SMS by destination prefix
  • SMS credit system per user
  • Multiple SMSC activated and routable
  • Timezone settings
  • Multi-language user interface (English, French, Bahasa Indonesia, Russian and a few others)
  • Easily add new language for user interface
  • Web-based interface
  • Android app for playSMS available on Google Play Store
  • Multi-domain from single playSMS installation with site branding for reseller supports

playSMS is a free and open source SMS management software. was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

playSMS is a free and open source SMS management software. was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

items.title: U-report
items.author: Raveesha N Bhat
items.description:
U-report is a free, SMS-based system that allows young people to speak out on what’s happening in communities across their country, and work together with other community leaders and policy makers for positive change. U-report conducts weekly SMS messages and polls to and from a growing community of U-reporters that are complimented with regular radio programs that will broadcast stories gathered by U-report as well as newspaper articles that will publish stories from the U-report community.

U-report was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

items.title: RapidSMS — Build scalable mobile services with Python
items.author: Nikkitha Shanker
items.description:
RapidSMS is a free and open-source framework for rapidly building mobile services for scale. RapidSMS is built with Python and Django and is designed for building robust, highly customized mobile services with web-based dashboards. RapidSMS provides a flexible platform and modular components for large-scale data collection, managing complex workflows, and automating data analysis.

RapidSMS — Build scalable mobile services with Python was originally published in MSGQ Cloud SMS on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.
